item.description:
Hi Outdoor Lovers!

We just booked a campsite at Tully Lake Campground over the Memorial Day Weekend.
http://www.thetrustee...

We will be there Sat. 24th, checking out Monday afternoon 26th.

Please let me know if you would like to join. There are only 2 more campsites available for reservation, so if you decide to go, please book soon.
Check for availability of site:
http://www.thetrustee...


We can add 1 more tent on our campsite, so if you are the first one to reply, feel free to share our campsite!

Hope you can join us! Irina.

group.name: Families with Russian Kids, Moms Club, Playgroups

item.name: Camping Anyone?
